description.zh-cn: 指1987年9月至1989年3月间，中国西藏地区发生的一系列警民冲突事件，被视为西藏独立运动的一部分。事件最终以中华人民共和国政府宣布戒严并以武力镇压结束。
description.en: A series of conflicts in the Tibet region of China from September 1987 to March 1989, considered part of the Tibetan independence movement. The events ended with the government of the People's Republic of China declaring martial law and suppressing the protests by force.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲的一个社会主义国家，通称中国，是本次骚乱事件中采取镇压行动的政府方。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, commonly known as China, which was the government side that took repressive actions during the unrest.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在1989年拉萨骚乱期间担任中共西藏自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region during the 1989 Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中华人民共和国国务院总理，于1989年3月5日下令在拉萨市实行戒严。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China at the time and ordered the imposition of martial law in Lhasa on March 5, 1989.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会
en: Tibet Autonomous Region Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西藏自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership organ of the Communist Party of China in the Tibet Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分之一，参与了对1989年拉萨骚乱的镇压行动。
description.en: One of the components of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China, which participated in the suppression of the 1989 Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量，参与了对1989年拉萨骚乱的镇压行动。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China, which participated in the suppression of the 1989 Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 旨在结束中国对西藏的统治，并使西藏成为一个主权独立国家的政治运动。1989年拉萨骚乱被视为该运动的一部分。
description.en: A political movement seeking to end Chinese rule over Tibet and establish it as a sovereign state. The 1989 Lhasa unrest is considered part of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区的首府，是1989年骚乱事件的主要发生地。
description.en: The capital of the Tibet Autonomous Region and the main location of the 1989 unrest.

description.zh-cn: 为应对1989年拉萨骚乱，中国国务院在拉萨市实施的戒严措施。
description.en: The martial law measures implemented in Lhasa by the State Council of China in response to the 1989 Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 藏族武警班长，在1989年3月5日的骚乱中被人殴打致死。
description.en: A Tibetan Armed Police squad leader who was beaten to death during the unrest on March 5, 1989.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的最高精神领袖，在此事件相关期间提出了“五点和平计划”并多次发表演讲。
description.en: The supreme spiritual leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who proposed the 'Five Point Peace Plan' and gave several speeches during the period related to this event.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的立法机关之一，曾通过决议谴责中国政府在西藏的镇压行动。
description.en: One of the legislative bodies of the European Union, which passed resolutions condemning the Chinese government's crackdown in Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国北京发生的一场大规模学生和民众抗议运动，其爆发影响了欧洲议会对拉萨骚乱事件的态度。
description.en: A large-scale student and popular protest movement in Beijing, China, in 1989. Its outbreak influenced the European Parliament's stance on the Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在1989年拉萨骚乱期间是政府方的领导人物之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was one of the leading figures on the government side during the 1989 Lhasa unrest.

nodes.id: 中共中央政治局常委会

zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常委会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。在拉萨骚乱后，根据胡锦涛的汇报制定了西藏工作指导意见。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China. After the Lhasa unrest, it formulated guiding opinions for work in Tibet based on Hu Jintao's report.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院总理李鹏于1989年3月5日宣布自3月7日起在拉萨市实行戒严，戒严直至1990年5月1日解除。
description.en: Premier Li Peng of the State Council announced on March 5, 1989, that martial law would be imposed in Lhasa starting March 7, which lasted until May 1, 1990.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 作为政府武装力量的一部分，中国人民武装警察部队被出动以武力镇压骚乱。
description.en: As part of the government's armed forces, the People's Armed Police were deployed to suppress the unrest by force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军部队被出动以武力平息冲突。
description.en: People's Liberation Army troops were deployed to quell the conflict by force.

relationships.target: 中国共产党西藏自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛于1988年12月1日起担任中共西藏自治区党委书记，是骚乱期间当地的最高负责人。
description.en: Hu Jintao served as the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region Committee of the CPC starting December 1, 1988, making him the highest official in the region during the unrest.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共西藏自治区党委书记，胡锦涛是镇压拉萨骚乱的主要决策者和指挥者之一。
description.en: As the Party Secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region, Hu Jintao was one of the key decision-makers and commanders in the suppression of the Lhasa unrest.

description.zh-cn: 在3月5日的示威游行中，驻八角街的武警班长袁石生被示威者殴打致死。
description.en: During the protest on March 5, Yuan Shisheng, an Armed Police squad leader stationed at Barkhor Street, was beaten to death by protesters.

description.zh-cn: 拉萨骚乱被视为西藏独立运动的一部分，是该运动中的一次重要事件。
description.en: The Lhasa unrest is considered a part of the Tibetan independence movement and a significant event within it.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 李鹏在事件发生时担任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Peng was the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China when the event occurred.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲议会通过决议，强烈谴责北京在西藏首府的暴力镇压行动，并要求解除戒严。
description.en: The European Parliament passed a resolution strongly condemning Beijing's violent crackdown in the Tibetan capital and demanded the lifting of martial law.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件的爆发促使欧洲议会对中国的人权问题采取更强硬的态度，包括对西藏问题的立场。
description.en: The outbreak of the Tiananmen Square protests prompted the European Parliament to adopt a tougher stance on China's human rights issues, including its position on Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 多吉才让是当时政府方的主要领导人物之一，参与了平息骚乱的行动。
description.en: Doje Cering was one of the main leaders on the government side at the time, involved in quelling the unrest.

relationships.target: 中共中央政治局常委会

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛向中共中央政治局常委会汇报了西藏的情况，后者据此形成了指导西藏工作的意见。
description.en: Hu Jintao reported on the situation in Tibet to the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, which then formulated guiding opinions for work in Tibet based on his report.
